short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll 'Up next' section and comments section while keeping an eye to the video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allow you to scroll in the 'Up next' panel and switch to an 'Comments view' whithout leaving the video of the screen
